function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Enclosed array of sensors may compromise indoor air quality","Impact":"Inaccurate measurements, potential health risks from poor indoor air quality","Mitigation":"Separate temperature-sensitive transducers into satellite device, conduct computational fluid dynamics (CFD) analysis","Technologies":"Computational fluid dynamics (CFD) analysis, satellite devices","People":"Employees working in the immediate workspace","Owner":"Design and engineering team"},{"Description":"Off-gassing of chemical compounds from housing materials","Impact":"Interference with indoor air quality sensors, inaccurate measurements","Mitigation":"Careful selection of materials to avoid off-gassing of chemical compounds","Technologies":"Material science","People":"Employees working in the immediate workspace","Owner":"Design and engineering team"},{"Description":"Intrusion of technology into immediate workspace","Impact":"Potential resistance or reluctance from employees","Mitigation":"Education and communication on the benefits of the technology, addressing privacy concerns","Technologies":"Education and communication strategies","People":"Employees working in the immediate workspace","Owner":"Management and project team"}]}
